room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Rush Hour Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Completed The Inheritance with some family. Excellent time, great puzzle, and the staff was phenomenal. Can't wait to try the next room, and look forward to new rooms. Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Rush Hour Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: My family of 4 went here today for my sons birthday. We did the Medieval Heist room. It was so fun we asked if the Inheritance room was available, it was, and went right back in for that room. We had a great time, would highly recommend these experiences.
